reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress chic and high-quality, with a nice fit that's tight enough for stomach control while being comfortable. The dress is flattering, with one customer noting how it accentuates the body, and they appreciate its thick material and double lining. While some it's not see-through, others find it somewhat transparent. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as pictured! Worth the purchase!
items.body: I never write reviews for anything, but my goodness I had to write one for this dress. It looks and feels like quality material, it fits snug while still being stretchy, and is incredibly elegant and flattering. I will be wearing it to a formal/black tie wedding. I’m 5’3” and approximately 130lbs. I was very hesitant about ordering an XS but I’m glad I did, it fits perfectly. If you’re between sizes, dare I recommend sizing down — only caveat being if you’re more chesty. Read more
items.author: Kayla

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: I got an XS im 5'1 about a 120lbs, it fit perfect. Material is a little stretchy but not too much. Not see through, its a soft as well. Color is super pretty and true to picture. Read more
items.author: Mariah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect wedding guest dress
items.body: I can’t say enough good things about this dress. True to size. Flattering. A girl at the same wedding was wearing this dress in a different color- we are different body types and it fit her like a glove (in her size, too). Stretchy and “warmer,” so maybe a good fall or winter wedding dress. Read more
items.author: Hannah Walker

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect
items.body: Wore this for my engagement pictures. Loved the dress. Very slimming. The only thing that was annoying was the straps were a bit longer than I personally needed so I had to have our photographer edit out the excess strap that was bunching up on my back. I could’ve gotten it altered beforehand but was in a pinch and it looked great. Read more
items.author: Leah Riale

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress for the Cost! Tons of Compliments
items.body: This dress, specifically in this color, was so flattering! It had a mesh overlay, and I loved the "choker"/"collar" detail. It was stretchy, so it was well fitted. I'd consider it true to size. Length wise, I know a lot of cheaper dresses only work on shorter frames. For reference, I'm 5'7" and proportionally I have long legs and shorter torso. On a similar frame it wont drag the floor, but as you can see on myself it was still a good length without being awkward. In my pictures you also can see the top of it did roll down a bit (like just half an inch) but wasn't that big of a deal. A lot of that I think was my son tugging on my top rather than the dress itself. I got TONS of compliments this evening. Great last minute option that is wedding friendly and comfy too! Read more
items.author: Danielle Field

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great white bridal era dress!!
items.body: Beautiful dress! Not see through and great material Read more
items.author: Michelle Rivera

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for me
items.body: Chokes you, awkward neck strap. Looked cute but uncomfortable Read more
items.author: Amy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: Absolutely love this dress! The neck does not “choke” you, it fits very comfortably. I am 5’3 and between 135-140lbs. I originally ordered a small but I could not get it to zip up all the way, it was too small around my upper back area. It fit my body well so I was a little disappointed. I returned for a Medium and it was little looser than I wanted around my body but did zip up and fit my top better. I have 34 DDD chest so may want to consider your breast size when ordering. I got compliments all night and the dress was comfortable and easy to dance in! It does have some stretch but still want to be mindful when choosing your size Read more
items.author: Savannah Walters

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Cocktail Bodycon Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Cocktail Bodycon Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Mesh Beigefloral, Wine, Brown, Blue, Black, Mesh Pinkfloral, Red, Lightpink, Mesh Brownfloral, Navy, Lavender, Pink, White, Yellow. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
